about_the_game:
Shooting simulator designed to help FPS players maximize their reflexes and aim. on discord, where you can connect with other players, show off your best score and get regular updates about Aim God development and upcoming features.

✅ Maximise Your Reflexes
✅ Improve Your Aim
✅ Warm Up Before An Important Game
✅ Compete Against other Players
✅ Track Your Performance
✅ Controller Support (new!)
✅ Collect achievements and show the world how good you are (NEW!)

Game Modes

Aim God contains multiple game modes, the mechanics of which push the player for better results. You can choose from 9 different modes with static, moving, or AI spheres trying to dodge your shot.


Game

If you are up for a bigger challenge, you can choose a higher precision difficulty. The higher difficulty, the smaller spheres you need to hit. But remember, you lose 10 health. for every missed shot. For every hit, you gain 1 health.

Performance Report

After completing a round, you can see detailed statistics about your performance - shooting accuracy, fast, slowest and every reaction time, as well as kills per second and much more.

Leaderboards

Become the best. Show the world how great your skills are. With Aim God's leaderboards, you can easily see others' high score and overcome them.

Achievements

As you play, you can collect up to 94 achievements. For playing time. For combo. For 0 misses. Everything you can think of. And afterwards, it will be visible on your Steam profile.

Settings

In the settings, you can set everything exactly according to your ideas, from graphic settings, through sound settings, to mouse sensitivity settings, weapon visibility, cursor size and color changes, and more.
detailed_description:
Update Notes

Aim God 2.0

  • 5 New game modes
  • Steam Leaderboards
  • 94 Achievements
  • Controller support
  • Reset button


About the Game

Shooting simulator designed to help FPS players maximize their reflexes and aim. on discord, where you can connect with other players, show off your best score and get regular updates about Aim God development and upcoming features.

✅ Maximise Your Reflexes
✅ Improve Your Aim
✅ Warm Up Before An Important Game
✅ Compete Against other Players
✅ Track Your Performance
✅ Controller Support (new!)
✅ Collect achievements and show the world how good you are (NEW!)

Game Modes

Aim God contains multiple game modes, the mechanics of which push the player for better results. You can choose from 9 different modes with static, moving, or AI spheres trying to dodge your shot.


Game

If you are up for a bigger challenge, you can choose a higher precision difficulty. The higher difficulty, the smaller spheres you need to hit. But remember, you lose 10 health. for every missed shot. For every hit, you gain 1 health.

Performance Report

After completing a round, you can see detailed statistics about your performance - shooting accuracy, fast, slowest and every reaction time, as well as kills per second and much more.

Leaderboards

Become the best. Show the world how great your skills are. With Aim God's leaderboards, you can easily see others' high score and overcome them.

Achievements

As you play, you can collect up to 94 achievements. For playing time. For combo. For 0 misses. Everything you can think of. And afterwards, it will be visible on your Steam profile.

Settings

In the settings, you can set everything exactly according to your ideas, from graphic settings, through sound settings, to mouse sensitivity settings, weapon visibility, cursor size and color changes, and more.
name: Aim God

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX560 and up
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Shooting simulator designed to help FPS players maximize their reflexes and aim.
